text: A octadecagon or 18-gon is a shape with 18 sides and 18 corners. == Regular octadecagon == All sides of a regular octadecagon are the same length. Each corner is 160°. All corners added together equal 2880°. === Area === The amount of space a regular octadecagon takes up is The area of a regular octadecagon of side length a is given by :A = \frac{18}{4}a^2\cot\frac{\pi}{18}\simeq 25,5208a^2 18
title: Octadecagon
